data: DERM AMB Psoriasis Day Care Program qdaily for 15 day (Day of Treatment)
Patient Care
Phototherapy Psoriasis Daycare Program Treatment
Not Applicable, 3000, mj/cm2, Minimum amount of time between exposures is 24 hours. Administer NB UVB treatment daily as per DST
Medications
Refer to Decision Support Tool:
anthralin-salicylic acid 0.1%-3% in hydrophilic petrolatum oint
1 application, topical, q3h interval, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 2 doses or times, drug form: oint

1 application, topical, once, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oint, Dispense Take Home Medication, Dispense qty: 100 g
